NHH.MC.summary: NH Hotel Group, S.A. operates hotels in Spain, Benelux, Italy, Germany, Latin America, and internationally. It operates in two segments, Real Estate and Hotel. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 368 hotels and 57,466 rooms. It is also involved in the real estate, investment, procurement network, and financing businesses; and provision of catering, management, corporate, call center, and other services. The company was formerly known as NH Hoteles, S.A. and changed its name to NH Hotel Group, S.A. in June 2014. NH Hotel Group, S.A. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain. NH Hotel Group, S.A. is a subsidiary of MHG Continental Holding (Singapore) Pte. Ltd.
